NK085(ru)001:1: // dam tshig gsal bkra zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK085(ru)001:2: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)001:3: dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal nas //
NK085(ru)001:4: thams cad mkhyen nyid mngon dad pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:5: rnal 'byor chen po rnams don phyir //
NK085(ru)001:6: sems bskyed cho ga bshad par bya //
NK085(ru)001:7: brtsom pa'i dang po med pas na //
NK085(ru)001:8: dpag tu med pa'i spro spyod kyang //
NK085(ru)001:9: sa bon rgya mtsho 'di med pas //
NK085(ru)001:10: mthar phyin 'bras bu mi snang ste //
NK085(ru)001:11: de nyid sdug bsngal sa bon 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:12: de bas gzhi 'di goms par byos //
NK085(ru)001:13: de la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan /
NK085(ru)001:14: 'byung khungs kyi rtsa bar nges pa ni sems yin te /
NK085(ru)001:16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang dag par rdzogs
NK085(ru)001:17: pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems
NK085(ru)001:18: so // rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po las byung ba'o //
NK085(ru)001:21: rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas
NK085(ru)001:22: kyi chos byang chub sems kyi sa bon lta bu'o
NK085(ru)001:24: chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni //
NK085(ru)001:25: snying rje byang chub sems yin te //
NK085(ru)001:26: yo byad de dang ma ldan na //
NK085(ru)001:27: don rnams grub par mi 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)001:28: tshad med snying rje bskyed pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:29: byang chub sems la dga' ba ni //
NK085(ru)001:30: sngon du 'gro ba'i mchog yin te //
NK085(ru)001:31: bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya //
NK085(ru)001:32: rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs //
NK085(ru)001:33: thabs kyi pha rol phyin par spyod //
NK085(ru)001:34: snying rjes chud ma zos par zung //
NK085(ru)001:35: gdon mi za bar 'grub ces gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:36: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:37: de dag gi khyad par ni /
NK085(ru)001:38: dper na sa chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste /
NK085(ru)001:39: 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med do //
NK085(ru)001:40: de bzhin du sems dang po skyed pa yang //
NK085(ru)001:41: snying po byang chub la thug gi bar du //
NK085(ru)001:42: sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ste //
NK085(ru)001:43: 'gyur ba med cing lan du phan 'dogs pa la re ba med pa'o //
NK085(ru)001:45: rdo rje rin po che chag kyang gser gyi rgyan
NK085(ru)001:46: khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa ste
NK085(ru)001:47: / rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi dor la /
NK085(ru)001:48: dbul ba thams cad kyang bzlog gi /
NK085(ru)001:49: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyed
NK085(ru)001:50: pa'i sems rin po che bsgrub pa dang ma ldan
NK085(ru)001:51: yang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon te /
NK085(ru)001:52: byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dor la /
NK085(ru)001:53: 'khor ba'i dbul ba las kyang bzlog go //
NK085(ru)001:54: dper na seng ge'i phru gu'i dri ma snam pa'i
NK085(ru)001:55: rdzi phyogs na gnas pa'i gcan zan thams cad kyang
NK085(ru)001:57: de bzhin du sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
NK085(ru)001:58: gang du phyin pa'i sa phyogs na gnas pa'i log
NK085(ru)001:59: par spyod pa'i sems can thams cad skrag par 'gyur
NK085(ru)001:60: ro // gnas 'dir bskyed pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po bla mar bcas pa'o //
NK085(ru)001:61: mchod gnas nyan thos bdud kyi sde rnams zil gyis gnon zhes gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:62: thabs chen byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i spyod pa'ang 'di nyid de /
NK085(ru)001:63: 'di med rgyal pa rnam par snang mdzad theg pa gsum ston mi srid do //
NK085(ru)001:64: skad cig tsam yang dad pa'i shugs skyed de yang myur du 'jam dpal gzhon nur 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:65: dkyil 'khor gsang bar zhugs shing theg chen dam tshig mchog kyang srung ba yin //
NK085(ru)001:66: tshul khrims sdom pa kun kyang bsrungs shing sbyin gnas dam par rab tu basngagasa //
NK085(ru)001:67: gang dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la //
NK085(ru)001:68: dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:69: de ni dngos dang 'dra ba ste //
NK085(ru)001:70: 'bras bu la yang mtho dman med //
NK085(ru)001:71: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //
NK085(ru)001:72: de la gal te gzugs yod na //
NK085(ru)001:73: nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste //
NK085(ru)001:74: de ni de las lhag par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:75: ces pa la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:76: de la sems bskyed mdor bstan te //
NK085(ru)001:77: dngos po gnyis dang rim pa bzhi //
NK085(ru)001:78: gzhi dang dbang po yo byad dang //
NK085(ru)001:79: tshig rims sems bskyed sdom pa'i dngos //
NK085(ru)001:80: sgo gsum las kyis spyod pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:81: shes bzhin bshags pa rnam bcu gcig /las kyi gtso bor gang len pa //
NK085(ru)001:82: de ni ldog par ma gsungs te //
NK085(ru)001:83: cung zad tsam gyi las rnams kyang //
NK085(ru)001:84: rgya mtsho bzhin du mi skam zhing //
NK085(ru)001:85: 'bras bu bdag gzhan gnyis la snang //
NK085(ru)001:86: de bas nan tan snying por gyis //
NK085(ru)001:87: kun rdzob sems ni snying rje'i mchog /sdug bsngal bcu gcig yul byas te //
NK085(ru)001:88: gdung bas bskyab pa'i sems bcas pas //
NK085(ru)001:89: mgon skyabs bdag por yid la byed //
NK085(ru)001:90: bdag bde rje dang don 'dor ba //
NK085(ru)001:91: de ni ldog pa ma gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:93: de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dren //
NK085(ru)001:94: sa dang rgya mtsho nor bu bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:95: yon tan don dang snang ba rnams //
NK085(ru)001:96: snying rje chen po nyid las byung //
NK085(ru)001:97: me long chu bzhin bsgrib byas pa //
NK085(ru)001:98: dngos grub gegs su bral gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:99: bu dang zhe 'gras spyod pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:100: byang chub sems dpa'i ming med na //
NK085(ru)001:101: sangs rgyas khas ches rnal 'byor cig /don dam nges par rab bshad pa //
NK085(ru)001:102: ma g.yos kun gzhi'i ngang du bshad //
NK085(ru)001:103: rang bzhin snang ba'i gser tshul ltar //
NK085(ru)001:104: gnyis su med par rgyal bas bshad //
NK085(ru)001:105: dri dang ga bur nus pa bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:106: mtshan ma med par sems mi dmigs //
NK085(ru)001:107: sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de //
NK085(ru)001:108: chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin no //
NK085(ru)001:109: chos sems gnyis med ldan gyur pas //
NK085(ru)001:110: bla med byang chub chen por bshad //
NK085(ru)001:111: nam mkhas gar khyab chos kyis khyab //
NK085(ru)001:112: chos nyid gar khyab sems yin pas //
NK085(ru)001:113: phyi nang gnyis med sems su gsal //
NK085(ru)001:114: mos dang rgyun dran mngon 'gyur bar //
NK085(ru)001:115: yid la byed pa'i sems dag gis //
NK085(ru)001:116: don 'di yongs su rdzogs par brjod //
NK085(ru)001:117: g.yo zhing smon par byed pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:118: rang bzhin mtshungs par ldan pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:119: zhar byung lhan cig byed pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:120: yon ten mthong thos rjes 'jug dang //
NK085(ru)001:121: byin rlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa bzhi //
NK085(ru)001:122: rkyen gyi rnam pa 'dus pa yin //
NK085(ru)001:123: skad cig cung zad sa bon las //
NK085(ru)001:124: btsa' ba bzhin du skye bar gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:125: lhag par 'phel ba'i gang zag gis //
NK085(ru)001:126: snying rje skye dang ltar ldan pas //
NK085(ru)001:127: don gnyis rgyu ru 'dir shes nas //
NK085(ru)001:128: goms pa mang du byas pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:129: zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du //
NK085(ru)001:130: je che je mang mangona'aphela bar //
NK085(ru)001:131: dam bca' 'jug par bya ba yin //
NK085(ru)001:132: lhag pa' bsam pa mngon byas te //
NK085(ru)001:133: 'gyur ba med par gnas par bya'o //
NK085(ru)001:134: dngos gzhi gnyis la rab brtan pa //
NK085(ru)001:135: 'jug pa'i skyes bur de bshad do //
NK085(ru)001:136: phyis 'byung sdom pa'i dngos po la //
NK085(ru)001:137: rgyun dang dum bur gang gnas pa //
NK085(ru)001:138: gnas pa'i sems su rab tu brtan //
NK085(ru)001:139: de nyams gsum du shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:140: gnas pa mang po'i mthu rdzogs pas //
NK085(ru)001:141: mngon byas rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs shing //
NK085(ru)001:142: bsgrub bya rkyen gyis mthar phyin pa //
NK085(ru)001:143: klong yangs nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la //
NK085(ru)001:144: sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyis brdal //
NK085(ru)001:145: mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo las //
NK085(ru)001:146: ji ltar bltas dgu'i der snang bas //
NK085(ru)001:147: don gnyis lhun grub rtog bral ba //
NK085(ru)001:148: mthar rdzogs sems su rgyal bas gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:149: bsngo gzhi sgrib bral nyid du bstan //
NK085(ru)001:150: yul nyid lnga yi dbang po ni //
NK085(ru)001:151: rim pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid can //
NK085(ru)001:152: snying rje chen po brlan ldan pas //
NK085(ru)001:153: kha grags 'dod pa'i sems gsum spangs //
NK085(ru)001:154: shes bya bar ma kun mkhyen pas //
NK085(ru)001:155: ma 'dres don gyi tha snyad rnams //
NK085(ru)001:156: nad dang sman gyi rim bzhin byed //
NK085(ru)001:157: ston pa'i mchog tu 'di gsungs pas //
NK085(ru)001:158: dang po'i rim la gnas pa'i mis //
NK085(ru)001:159: brtson 'grus dga' ba'i las rnams kyis //
NK085(ru)001:160: 'du shes ston par bzhag ste blang //
NK085(ru)001:161: cung zad 'gal ba'i sems med par //
NK085(ru)001:162: rtag pa gdung bas rmongs byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:163: de 'dra bral bas ma gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:164: dpang 'gyur rdo rje dam can rnams //
NK085(ru)001:165: byin rlabs gnyen pa'i sems dag gis //
NK085(ru)001:166: las kyi stongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:167: zhing khams bye ba'i rdul 'das pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:168: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas bzhugs par bya //
NK085(ru)001:169: de dag rtag tu mngon bsam ste //
NK085(ru)001:170: shes bzhin rang gi sdam pa bsngo //
NK085(ru)001:171: smon lam dbang gis gzigs par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:172: man+dala bdud rtsi'i dris byugs pa //
NK085(ru)001:173: tsan dan bdud rtsi'i chus sbyangs pa //
NK085(ru)001:174: dri zhim chas kyis rab brgyan te //
NK085(ru)001:175: rin chen 'byor pa lag thogs bya //
NK085(ru)001:176: sna tshogs yol ba'i phyi rol 'dug /kha sbyar ban d+ha'i bum chu sbyin //
NK085(ru)001:177: dril bus rdo rje'i ming brtags bya //
NK085(ru)001:178: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas gzugs brnyan dgram //
NK085(ru)001:179: sna tshogs mchod pa rgyas pa dag /
NK085(ru)001:180: 'khor gsum dag pa'i sems kyis dbul //
NK085(ru)001:181: kha gsil rol mo rgyas par sbyin //
NK085(ru)001:182: 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma dang //
NK085(ru)001:183: 'gro drug sbyin pa chen po'i ngang //
NK085(ru)001:184: dug gsum spangs pa'i sems kyis gtang //
NK085(ru)001:185: sems skyed mtshon pa'i rdo rje yang //
NK085(ru)001:186: rtag tu bcang bar bya ba yin //
NK085(ru)001:188: g.yo bar mkhan pos gsal btab pas //
NK085(ru)001:189: mkhan pos gsol ba btab nas ni //
NK085(ru)001:190: dad pa'i sems la gnas su gzhug /dgos pa'i yo byad rang 'byor nas //
NK085(ru)001:191: dge ba'i bar chad bzlog pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:192: rdo rje mi shigs gur bcing bya //
NK085(ru)001:193: bum chu gsum po byin brlab phyir //
NK085(ru)001:194: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dran pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:195: bgegs bskrad pa yi rang bzhin du //
NK085(ru)001:196: 'bru lnga ye shes chu rgyun dgug /ma lus 'dus pa'i khrom bzhin tshogs //
NK085(ru)001:197: bskyed dang spyan drangs mchod tshogs sbyar //
NK085(ru)001:198: sngags bzlos gsol btab bu byin brlab //
NK085(ru)001:199: khrus byas dri zhim rgyan ldan bu //
NK085(ru)001:200: yol phyir phyag byas thal sbyar te //
NK085(ru)001:201: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag /
NK085(ru)001:203: sdug bsngal chu bo rgyun bzlog dang //
NK085(ru)001:204: don gnyis bdag gis mngon byed pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:205: thabs kyi las mtha' gang lags pa //
NK085(ru)001:206: rim pa yang dag bstan pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:207: thugs rje nye bar skyed mdzad de //
NK085(ru)001:208: de ring gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
NK085(ru)001:209: ma lus phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:210: sngon gyi dbang po ji snyed pa //
NK085(ru)001:211: rgyas par spyan drangs mchod par bya //
NK085(ru)001:212: sangs rgyas lta ba'i mos byas pas //
NK085(ru)001:213: lag bzung nang du gnas par bya //
NK085(ru)001:214: thal sbyar zhing la lus dbul bya //
NK085(ru)001:215: bi shud d+he dang sbyor sngags kyi //
NK085(ru)001:216: tsan dan bdud rtsi chu sbyar de //
NK085(ru)001:217: dad pa'i lhar skyed byin gyis brlab //
NK085(ru)001:218: rin chen bsnyen pas gsol btab pas //
NK085(ru)001:219: rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyis //
NK085(ru)001:220: thugs rje nye bar bskyed mdzad de //
NK085(ru)001:221: dam tshig dam bcas rim pa bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:222: bdag la byin gyis brlabs par rigs //
NK085(ru)001:223: rab tu gtor te 'brel ba brtag /rdo rje'i ming yang spyin par bya //
NK085(ru)001:224: ding khyod sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor gyis //
NK085(ru)001:225: rim par rab bzhugs nges pa yin //
NK085(ru)001:226: dam tshig 'dod pa'i sems skyed cing //
NK085(ru)001:227: gzhan don rab dag'i sems ldan pas //
NK085(ru)001:228: bshags pa'i mchog gis rab shogs te //
NK085(ru)001:229: dag pa'i sems kyis brlab par gyis //
NK085(ru)001:231: brtan nas sgud cing mos byed de //
NK085(ru)001:232: mtha' rnams bral ba'i byang chub sems //
NK085(ru)001:233: mi rtog mi gnas nam mkha' nyid //
NK085(ru)001:234: chos rnams de 'drar mos pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:235: mthong sgom lam la gnas pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:236: mthar phyin thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
NK085(ru)001:237: dam bcas yid kyis brtan par bya //
NK085(ru)001:238: rgyun yang de bzhin bstan par gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:239: de yi yon tan dpe rnams kyi //
NK085(ru)001:240: nges par mtshon pa bzhi ru bshad //
NK085(ru)001:241: brtan pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do //
NK085(ru)001:242: ma rig zhi dang bcas pa'i sems //
NK085(ru)001:243: skad cig rgyun gyi las nyon mongs //
NK085(ru)001:244: mthun par snang ba'i bltos pa'i chos //
NK085(ru)001:245: rmi lam bzhin du nyams thag rnams //
NK085(ru)001:246: dran pa'i snying rje gdung sems kyis //
NK085(ru)001:247: khyad par zhing du mngon byas pa //
NK085(ru)001:248: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzlog pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:249: cho 'phrul las dang sku don rnams //
NK085(ru)001:250: rgyal bas grangs mtha' mi rdzogs so //
NK085(ru)001:251: mngon 'dod bya ba'i mos pa dag /brtan par bskyed cing rgyun gnas pa //
NK085(ru)001:252: sems kyis sngon bzhin gnas par bya //
NK085(ru)001:253: thal sbyar gus pa'i lus gnas te //
NK085(ru)001:254: dang por gsol ba'i tshig bshad bzhi //
NK085(ru)001:255: sngon du btang nas gtam par bya //
NK085(ru)001:256: dkyil 'khor mchod pa sbyin sreg sogs //
NK085(ru)001:257: gzhan don grangs mang ji snyed pa //
NK085(ru)001:258: tshe 'di gnas tsam mthar thug par //
NK085(ru)001:259: nam yang rgyun chad ma gyur cig /thun mong thabs kyis spyod drug dang //
NK085(ru)001:260: mi mthun 'dul ba'i spyod pa rnams //
NK085(ru)001:261: de bzhin bstan par bsgrub pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:262: 'gro ba mi 'dul med par shog /dam bcas rim pa'i sdom pa rnams //
NK085(ru)001:263: tshigs bshad bzhin du sems kyis bsgrub //
NK085(ru)001:264: don gnyis 'gyur ba'i lus spyod dag /lus kyi le lo spangs pas byas //
NK085(ru)001:265: don med spyod pa sems kyis mnan //
NK085(ru)001:266: snying po bshad dang phan pa'i gtam //
NK085(ru)001:267: ma gtogs pa yi rgyun bcad de //
NK085(ru)001:268: le lo spangs pas gsum bsgrub bya //
NK085(ru)001:269: ca co nam yang ma yin pa //
NK085(ru)001:270: sangs rgyas chos su de bshad do //
NK085(ru)001:271: bsam gtan shes rab rab ma dang //
NK085(ru)001:272: snying rje sdom pa bsngosa pa'i sems //
NK085(ru)001:273: g.yeng dang bying rmugs rnams spangs pas //
NK085(ru)001:274: bsam bya rtag par gang dran pa //
NK085(ru)001:275: sangs rgyas chos bzhir 'di bshad do //
NK085(ru)001:276: sgo gsum chung bar mos grub pas //
NK085(ru)001:277: rtag tu rang nyams smod byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:278: dam tshig sdom pa'i gzhir shes bya //
NK085(ru)001:279: sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs thob 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:280: rgyas par yon tan brjod mi lang //
NK085(ru)001:281: khud pa'i zhing du gyur rnams la //
NK085(ru)001:282: sdug bsngal yin yang mthar phan spyod //
NK085(ru)001:283: bstod cing mtho sems rab spangs pas //
NK085(ru)001:284: 'khrul pa ji snyed brjod mi lang //
NK085(ru)001:286: rgan po bla ma'i 'du shes byed //
NK085(ru)001:287: phrag dog can la sems ngan med //
NK085(ru)001:288: dpag tshad du ma'i mthar gnas bya //
NK085(ru)001:289: man ngag zang zing lan spangs sbyin //
NK085(ru)001:290: 'gron gnyer rgos med dbang du bya //
NK085(ru)001:291: don yod sdig pa dang du blang //
NK085(ru)001:292: ma bsngosa 'tsho ba rtag tu spang //
NK085(ru)001:293: grags dang 'gran nor dge ba dor //
NK085(ru)001:294: nyams la snying rje gtang snyoms spang //
NK085(ru)001:295: don 'gyur phyir na bdag dge spang //
NK085(ru)001:296: de ni ldog par ma gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:297: 'dzin pa spangs pa'i sbyin pa bzhi //
NK085(ru)001:298: 'chad pas sbyin pa bzlog par bya //
NK085(ru)001:299: lus 'dod dum bu'i sems dag gis //
NK085(ru)001:300: sprul sku thob phyir sbyin par bya //
NK085(ru)001:301: nyam sod log lta sun dbyung phyir //
NK085(ru)001:302: skal pa'i sbyin pas bzlog par bya //
NK085(ru)001:303: bsam gtan ro mchog klung gnas kyang //
NK085(ru)001:304: theg dman spyod pa dor ba med //
NK085(ru)001:305: 'dod pa'i sems kyis grang mi gnyer //
NK085(ru)001:306: bzlog pa'i sems kyis grong rgyu ba //
NK085(ru)001:307: chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)001:308: nad dang sdug bsngal can g.yos byad //
NK085(ru)001:309: tshul khrims bsam spyod lhur mi 'dzin //
NK085(ru)001:310: mnyes dang bral na dag par gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:311: rtsod pa'i rtsa ba sems dran dang //
NK085(ru)001:312: rnam smin dran pas bzlog par bya //
NK085(ru)001:313: khong khro nyes chen bral 'gyur ba //
NK085(ru)001:314: 'di ldan byang chub sems dpa' med //
NK085(ru)001:315: chos spyod bcu la dam bcas nas //
NK085(ru)001:316: thun mong zhen pa bzlog par bya //
NK085(ru)001:317: sdug bsngal bsam pa nam mi 'dor //
NK085(ru)001:318: snod ma bltas la sems mi brtan //
NK085(ru)001:319: de la don 'gyur spang mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:320: phan byed rnams la la mi glan //
NK085(ru)001:321: mya ngan ci yang bsad par bya //
NK085(ru)001:322: sgro skur spangs te yon tan brjod //
NK085(ru)001:323: ngan byed mthong ba me smon dang //
NK085(ru)001:324: sngos ngan mthong ba de bzhin ste //
NK085(ru)001:325: smon lam bdag gi zheng du btab //
NK085(ru)001:326: bzang por spyod dang dngos po bzang //
NK085(ru)001:327: mchod rdzas mthong ba ji snyed pa //
NK085(ru)001:328: bdag zhing kun gyis spyod par smon //
NK085(ru)001:329: gdug pa sangs zhing gnas dang //
NK085(ru)001:330: 'gro ba sprul pas don byed dang //
NK085(ru)001:331: byin pa bsam gtan bden pa rnams dang //
NK085(ru)001:332: bsam rtsis chos kyi bsam pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:333: 'greng ba sems can don bstan dang //
NK085(ru)001:334: dpa' bo bdud bzhi g.yul 'joms dang //
NK085(ru)001:335: thams cad spyod bzhin ma gos dang //
NK085(ru)001:336: srog gcod khro bo'i phrin las dang //
NK085(ru)001:337: 'dod chags mnyam par sbyor ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:338: rku byed dngos grub len pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:339: ri bo rtog pas mi phrogs dang //
NK085(ru)001:340: chu rgyun chos spyod rgyun ldan dang //
NK085(ru)001:341: 'bras bu sku dang ye shes dang //
NK085(ru)001:342: me tog rnam grol phung po dang //
NK085(ru)001:343: yul khams rnam dag 'jig rten dang //
NK085(ru)001:344: kha zas ting 'dzin ro mchog dang //
NK085(ru)001:345: skom dang snying rje chu 'thung sogs //
NK085(ru)001:346: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can la //
NK085(ru)001:347: smon lam yid kyis zin par bya //
NK085(ru)001:348: gzhan phyir bdag kyang de bzhin smon //
NK085(ru)001:349: rtsa ba'i spyod pa gsum sogs pa //
NK085(ru)001:350: sems skyed sdom pa blangs nas mthong //
NK085(ru)001:351: nyams med bsam pa'i dran pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:352: shes bzhin lta bas brtag dngos te //
NK085(ru)001:353: gang zhig sngon goms dbang nyams pa //
NK085(ru)001:354: 'gyod dang bcas pas sor gzhug bya //
NK085(ru)001:355: yi ge la sogs bzo mtha' rnams //
NK085(ru)001:356: rtsol bas rgyun tu 'jug byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:357: goms te sla bar ma gyur pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:358: dngos de gang yang yod ma yin //
NK085(ru)001:359: spyod lam rnam gsum dran bya ba //
NK085(ru)001:360: byang chub sems dpa'i ming thob ste //
NK085(ru)001:361: de ni ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)001:362: dper na phyug po nor sdod pa //
NK085(ru)001:363: med par gyur pa sor 'jug bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:364: spyod pa mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK085(ru)001:365: zhig pa bzhin du mi gnas te //
NK085(ru)001:367: dpang por gyur pa'i rten dag la //
NK085(ru)001:368: sngon du man+dala mchod sbyar nas //
NK085(ru)001:369: me tog phyag 'tshal lus gus pas //
NK085(ru)001:370: 'gyod sems dngos po gang gis bshags //
NK085(ru)001:371: de bzhin slar yang blang bar bya //
NK085(ru)001:372: bdag dang dngos po 'bras bu rnams //
NK085(ru)001:373: mi dmigs sems kyi bshags bya bar //
NK085(ru)001:374: de ni nyes par ma gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:375: 'di ni shin tu gsang ba'i chos //
NK085(ru)001:376: bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don 'gyur phyir //
NK085(ru)001:377: sdom pa rnam grangs 'phel mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:378: 'dod pa sbyin pa'ang de bzhin no //
NK085(ru)001:379: thun mong rab tu zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:380: bslab pa mthar chub de las grol ba'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:381: las mtha' sems bskyed cho ga mdor bshad pas //
NK085(ru)001:382: 'gro ba mtha' dag byang chub sems ldan shog /sems skyed pa'i cho ga mdor bshad pa rdzogs so //
NK085(ru)001:384: de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas //
NK085(ru)001:385: lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir //
NK085(ru)001:386: rgyud gsum nges par gsal byed cing //
NK085(ru)001:387: dam tshig chen po mdor bshad pa //
NK085(ru)001:388: lam gyi rgyud la zhugs pa rnams //
NK085(ru)001:389: bslab pa gsum la gnas byas nas //
NK085(ru)001:390: don gnyis mngon du byed pa yang //
NK085(ru)001:391: nang ris la la mun snang phyir //
NK085(ru)001:392: gcig gis 'thad pa ma yin la //
NK085(ru)001:393: la la cha mthun spyad pa'i rigs //
NK085(ru)001:394: gdul bya skabs kyis rim spyod pa //
NK085(ru)001:395: sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'di gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:396: gnyer 'di lung gis lus bzhag na //
NK085(ru)001:397: ngo bo rnam grangs bsrung thabs dang //
NK085(ru)001:398: nyams rgyu snga rtags skyon yon gnyis //
NK085(ru)001:399: skong thabs dpe dang mdo bcur bcad //
NK085(ru)001:400: ngo bo rtsa ba bzhi dag ni //
NK085(ru)001:401: thun min thun mong yan lag gnyis //
NK085(ru)001:402: rtsa ba chen po mdor 'brel lo //
NK085(ru)001:403: dam tshig rnam pa'i grangs dag ni //
NK085(ru)001:404: sems can grangs dang log rtog grangs //
NK085(ru)001:405: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen phyir //
NK085(ru)001:406: rtog 'dul gnyen po dam tshig grangs //
NK085(ru)001:407: rgyal ba nyid kyis brjod las 'das //
NK085(ru)001:408: 'on kyang rmongs la mdor gzung ba //
NK085(ru)001:409: byang sems rnam gnyis slob dpon drug /mched bzhi sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi //
NK085(ru)001:410: gsang bcu rtsa bar shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:411: spyad pa lnga dang mi spang lnga //
NK085(ru)001:412: dang du blang dang bsgrub de bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:413: shes bya lnga rnams thun min bshad //
NK085(ru)001:414: yan lag skabs su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:415: thun mong dam tshig mdor bshad pa //
NK085(ru)001:416: mdor bsdus bdag gzhan don gnyis so //
NK085(ru)001:417: rnam grangs skabs su shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:418: bsrung ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste //
NK085(ru)001:419: rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya che //
NK085(ru)001:420: sems can khams kyang der shes shing //
NK085(ru)001:421: snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku //
NK085(ru)001:422: byas mthong zos pa thams cad la //
NK085(ru)001:423: sems phyir gang yang byas snang med //
NK085(ru)001:424: dran dang shes bzhin mngon bsten la //
NK085(ru)001:425: dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na //
NK085(ru)001:426: theg chen basngagasa par ci zhig tshud //
NK085(ru)001:427: lta spyod dam tshig 'brel pa yi //
NK085(ru)001:428: spyi dang 'dren dang dam tshig dbang //
NK085(ru)001:429: nyams chag skong dang shes rgyud 'grol //
NK085(ru)001:430: man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnams //
NK085(ru)001:431: yul la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang //
NK085(ru)001:432: khu bo ma dang pha dang mig /snying bas lhag pa'i tshul bltas te //
NK085(ru)001:433: sgo gsum zol sgyu med pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:434: yi dam lha ltar rgyun du bsam //
NK085(ru)001:435: bsrung rim 'chad bzhin shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:436: mtha' yas sems can rang rig phyir //
NK085(ru)001:437: gang yang bdag las gzhan min dang //
NK085(ru)001:438: bde gshegs snying po spun ring phyir //
NK085(ru)001:439: ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin //
NK085(ru)001:440: spyi yi mched de pha tshan bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:441: sangs rgyas chos zhugs ring ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:442: lta spyod mthun pas nye bar bshad //
NK085(ru)001:443: pha gcig dam tshig nang 'dres pa //
NK085(ru)001:444: zhang tshan pha spun spun pas kyang //
NK085(ru)001:445: lhag par bltas te bsrung ba ni //
NK085(ru)001:446: lus kyi zas nor mnyes bya ba //
NK085(ru)001:447: sbur ma lta bur 'phangs pa med //
NK085(ru)001:448: gtan bting khur sogs las bya ba //
NK085(ru)001:449: bran bzhin nges par dang du blang //
NK085(ru)001:450: bla ma'i rigs 'khor de bzhin du //
NK085(ru)001:451: nor zas blangs pa rnam smin phyir //
NK085(ru)001:452: til phub tsam yang mi 'bag cing //
NK085(ru)001:453: mal gos chags sogs 'gong mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:454: mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:455: brdeg bsad rku 'phrog spyod pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:456: dngos su bya ba ci smos kyi //
NK085(ru)001:457: rtsed mo las su bya ba min //
NK085(ru)001:458: ngag gis skyon sbas yon tan bsgrags //
NK085(ru)001:459: tshul brjod pa ni nyams par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:460: skyon skur la sogs mtshan nyid dag /bre mo gtam du zur mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)001:461: yid kyis g.yo rgyu phrag dog dang //
NK085(ru)001:462: ngan sems dpya sems nor la brkam //
NK085(ru)001:463: se gol yun du'ang bya ba min //
NK085(ru)001:464: shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya //
NK085(ru)001:465: spyod lam cis kyang mnyes byed cing //
NK085(ru)001:466: bka' yi zur yang mi bcag pa //
NK085(ru)001:467: de ni ldog par ma gsungs so //
NK085(ru)001:468: rtsa ba bskyed dang las sngags kyis //
NK085(ru)001:469: dam tshig las dang chos dang ni //
NK085(ru)001:470: sku nyid phyag rgya chen po bzhi //
NK085(ru)001:471: rang gi sgo gsum yi dam gyi //
NK085(ru)001:472: sku gsung thugs su mngon sbyar la //
NK085(ru)001:473: rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:474: byang chub gzung la zhugs pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:475: rab kyis chu bo'i rgyun bzhin nas //
NK085(ru)001:476: nyin gsum mtshan gsum nyin cig du //
NK085(ru)001:477: ma yengs pa ye ngag gis bzlas //
NK085(ru)001:478: 'bring gi zla gcig dus drug tu //
NK085(ru)001:479: dus bzhi'i bar du mi bcad cing //
NK085(ru)001:480: tha ma bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK085(ru)001:481: zla re 'am ra ba'i dus dag tu //
NK085(ru)001:482: brtson pas 'bad de mi byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:483: byang chub sa bon brlag pa yin //
NK085(ru)001:484: tshogs dang gtor ma de bzhin te //
NK085(ru)001:486: lta zab spyod pa barlanga po dang //
NK085(ru)001:487: lha ming gzungs dang grub rtags rnams //
NK085(ru)001:488: spyi gsang rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
NK085(ru)001:489: sgrub pa'i gnas dus grogs dang rdzas //
NK085(ru)001:490: bar du gsang la bsgrub par bya //
NK085(ru)001:491: gsang bar 'os la mdor bsdu na //
NK085(ru)001:492: phud dang gtor ma tshogs dag dang //
NK085(ru)001:493: b+han d+ha phur pa mar me snod //
NK085(ru)001:494: rdzas dang lag cha dkyil 'khor rnams //
NK085(ru)001:495: skye bos mthon bar yod mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:496: dril bu rnga chung la sogs sgra //
NK085(ru)001:497: skye bos thos par yong mi brdung //
NK085(ru)001:498: grogs po'i spyod dang mtshan rnams dang //
NK085(ru)001:499: sems can kun kyang ngan spyod dang //
NK085(ru)001:500: kun la gnod pa'i spyod pa rnams //
NK085(ru)001:501: shin tu gsang na byang chub rgyu //
NK085(ru)001:502: gnyer gtad pa ni gdam ngag ste //
NK085(ru)001:503: sngar bshad slob dpon rnams kyis so //
NK085(ru)001:504: gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te //
NK085(ru)001:505: sems can don phyir rab tu gsang //
NK085(ru)001:506: gsang thub dngos grub mi yal bas //
NK085(ru)001:507: shin tu gsang na byang chub rgyu //
NK085(ru)001:508: gsang phyir gdam ngag sna tshogs gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:509: dam nyams dam las log pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:510: dam med dkyil 'khor ma mthong zhing //
NK085(ru)001:512: sems kyis bstan pa mi bsam zhing //
NK085(ru)001:513: lus kyis thams cad sbas la spyod //
NK085(ru)001:514: ngag gi rdo rje lce yod kyang //
NK085(ru)001:515: brjod pa dag tu bya ba med //
NK085(ru)001:516: de dag rtsa ba bzhir bshad do //
NK085(ru)001:517: thun min yan lag bshad bya ba //
NK085(ru)001:518: sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:519: rdzun smra ngag barlanga spyad bya lnga //
NK085(ru)001:520: rang bzhin gyi ni sbyor sgrol dang //
NK085(ru)001:521: dbang po yul gyi sbyor sgrol dang //
NK085(ru)001:522: ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor sgrol dang //
NK085(ru)001:523: mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lnga'o //
NK085(ru)001:524: gnyis ni shes bya thun min bshad //
NK085(ru)001:525: ting 'dzin bslab pa thun mong gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:526: mngon phyung dam tshig chen po la //
NK085(ru)001:527: byed pa'i tshig lnga shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:529: dkon mchog slob dpon sku dgra gnyis //
NK085(ru)001:530: dam nyams log dang 'khus pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:532: dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can //
NK085(ru)001:533: ngan song gsum dang bcu po ni //
NK085(ru)001:534: rnal 'byor kun gyis dang du blang //
NK085(ru)001:535: grangs kyis rtsa ba bcu bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)001:536: ting 'a dzin sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
NK085(ru)001:537: shin tu goms pas dbang bskur ro //
NK085(ru)001:538: byang chub zhing du dgod par bya //
NK085(ru)001:539: ting 'dzin sngags rgyas bag chags sbyangs //
NK085(ru)001:541: ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:542: phur po byin brlabs mchod par bsgo //
NK085(ru)001:544: de ltar bsgral ba'i dgos ched kyang //
NK085(ru)001:545: byang chub spyod 'phel sems can bde //
NK085(ru)001:546: lha mnyes bdag gis dam bskongs shing //
NK085(ru)001:547: las ngan bar chad sdug yun thung //
NK085(ru)001:548: rang gis bsags med ngan song las //
NK085(ru)001:549: bde lam 'di las gzhan med do //
NK085(ru)001:551: byang chub sems dang 'dul dbang gis //
NK085(ru)001:552: barngona dang smad 'tshong ston yang ltung //
NK085(ru)001:553: khe dang spyod pas de min phyir //
NK085(ru)001:554: thabs chen lam la gnas pa yi //
NK085(ru)001:555: skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung //
NK085(ru)001:556: ga na'i dam tshig chen po ni //
NK085(ru)001:557: log chags yid 'ongs spangs pa yi //
NK085(ru)001:558: don gnyis mngon du byed pa yi //
NK085(ru)001:559: pad can dung can ri mo can //
NK085(ru)001:560: ban glang can dang lcug phran can //
NK085(ru)001:561: sdong gcig me reg phyal ba brgyad //
NK085(ru)001:562: mnyen drang skad ring stod smad phyed //
NK085(ru)001:564: dpral ba'i dbyes che smin khyugs ring //
NK085(ru)001:565: mig phra dkyil nas ut+pala mdog /chu zhing gnyis ka 'bring du bshad //
NK085(ru)001:566: lus dang chu rlung ga bur dri //
NK085(ru)001:567: gsang thub shes rab spyod pa dal //
NK085(ru)001:568: dad ldan 'grogs shing dad che ba //
NK085(ru)001:569: gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya //
NK085(ru)001:570: dbang bskur dam tshig chos gsum bshad //
NK085(ru)001:571: lus la rigs lnga'i rdul tshon dbye //
NK085(ru)001:572: thabs la mkhas pas skabs kyis sbyar //
NK085(ru)001:573: dam tshig rnam grangs bcu gnyis kyi //
NK085(ru)001:574: dngos grub yon tan bsam mi khyab //
NK085(ru)001:575: slob bu smin cing las rnams 'grub //
NK085(ru)001:576: skye gnas ngan 'gro ris drug des //
NK085(ru)001:577: thabs kyi theg pa 'di bshad do //
NK085(ru)001:578: mtshan nyid chad dang rnam grangs dang //
NK085(ru)001:579: ltos pa'i kun brtag rnam pa gsum //
NK085(ru)001:580: dngos po de nyid la rdzun shes //
NK085(ru)001:581: thams cad rang gi snang phyir bden //
NK085(ru)001:582: shes nas kun smra skyes bu'i yul //
NK085(ru)001:583: dkon mchog gsum dang slob dpon mched //
NK085(ru)001:584: sems can gnod par 'ongs pa la //
NK085(ru)001:585: rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig bya //
NK085(ru)001:586: gang la gsang bar bya ba rnams //
NK085(ru)001:587: gsang bcu las 'di rdzun bcu smra //
NK085(ru)001:588: bsrung ba bcu bdun nyams su blangs //
NK085(ru)001:589: zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu dang //
NK085(ru)001:590: mtshan ldan gzungs dang bkra shis rdzas //
NK085(ru)001:591: sbas chos phal 'chang byin can rdzas //
NK085(ru)001:592: bsrung ba yon dam med pa'i nor //
NK085(ru)001:593: phyug po ser snas bcings pa'i nor //
NK085(ru)001:594: ming gis blangs la tshogs su bsngo //
NK085(ru)001:595: dam tshig bcu bdun spyad par bya //
NK085(ru)001:596: zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can la //
NK085(ru)001:597: barlanga tshig bcu yi zhe bcad cing //
NK085(ru)001:598: drag shul spyod pa sngags dag dang //
NK085(ru)001:599: gzungs la barlanga por sbyor ba'i tshig /slob bu snod bcos zhe gcod dang //
NK085(ru)001:600: 'byung po zhe gcod rngam pa'i sgra //
NK085(ru)001:601: snod ldan bu la rngam chos bshad //
NK085(ru)001:602: ngag gi dam tshig bco lnga bsrung //
NK085(ru)001:603: mi spang dam tshig bshad par bya //
NK085(ru)001:604: yang dag dug lnga log dug lnga //
NK085(ru)001:605: bshad pa'i thabs mkhas 'dod chags dang //
NK085(ru)001:606: 'dod spyod sems kyi rgyan shes nas //
NK085(ru)001:607: shin tu zhen pa lam du gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:608: zhing bcu brlag byed zhe sdong mchog /lha ngan 'joms pa de bzhin te //
NK085(ru)001:609: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yin //
NK085(ru)001:610: mngon par mtho pa'i lta ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:611: ting 'dzin nges par sran tshugs pa //
NK085(ru)001:612: shin tu rgyal ba'i mchog tu gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:613: lta bas phyogs ris mi phyed dang //
NK085(ru)001:614: spyod pa blang dor mi byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:615: theg pa chen po'i gti mug go //
NK085(ru)001:616: lta spyod dman la phrag dog cing //
NK085(ru)001:617: dam 'dres la sogs spong byed pa //
NK085(ru)001:618: phrag dog dam tshig bsrung ba'o //
NK085(ru)001:619: log dus sems can kun ldan pa //
NK085(ru)001:620: dug lngar rang rig rang snang phyir //
NK085(ru)001:621: dran pa thams cad shes pa la //
NK085(ru)001:622: shes pa thams cad rtsol ba yin //
NK085(ru)001:623: rtsol ba sems phyir thabs mkhas pa //
NK085(ru)001:624: thabs mkhas rang rig ye shes te //
NK085(ru)001:625: nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar //
NK085(ru)001:626: ye shes rang snang ma rtogs pa //
NK085(ru)001:627: nyon mongs 'khor ba ngang gis med //
NK085(ru)001:628: de shes rang rig ye shes la //
NK085(ru)001:629: spang bar bya ba dmigs mi 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:630: dam tshig bco lnga la gnas pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:631: rnal 'byor chen po don gnyis rdzogs //
NK085(ru)001:632: kun gyis blang ba'i dam tshig lnga //
NK085(ru)001:633: dri chen dri chu mam sa dang //
NK085(ru)001:634: zil ma lhag pa'i sems rnams la //
NK085(ru)001:635: grub pa bzhi yis brgyan pa'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:636: nad lnga bsal phyir blang ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:637: gtsog dme rtog sbyang phyir blang dang //
NK085(ru)001:638: thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang //
NK085(ru)001:639: rigs lnga 'grub pa'i yon tan no //
NK085(ru)001:640: sdug bsngal grol ba'i yon tan ni //
NK085(ru)001:641: bcud lnga btung dbang lam gyi mchog /thabs kyi lus la brtan shes na //
NK085(ru)001:642: yon tan brjod las 'das par gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:643: phye ba'i dam tshig sum cu nyid //
NK085(ru)001:644: skabs kyis dang du blang bar bya //
NK085(ru)001:645: bsgrub par bya ba lnga rnams la //
NK085(ru)001:646: rig dang ye shes yab yum lnga //
NK085(ru)001:647: gcig la lnga lngar shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:648: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las //
NK085(ru)001:649: gcig kyang lnga lngar phye bas na //
NK085(ru)001:650: bzhi bcu lnga yi bye brag rnams //
NK085(ru)001:651: mtshan nyid shes nas bsgrub par bya'o //
NK085(ru)001:652: shes bya lnga la bye brag dang //
NK085(ru)001:653: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dang //
NK085(ru)001:654: dbang po yul dang yan lag sar //
NK085(ru)001:655: nyon mongs dam rdzas sha dang ni //
NK085(ru)001:656: phyogs dang kha dog 'gro ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:657: snyigs ma bag chags lnga lnga po //
NK085(ru)001:658: bdun cu la sogs 'khor ba'i chos //
NK085(ru)001:659: ye shes sku rigs yab yum sogs //
NK085(ru)001:660: rang bzhin ngang gis kar dag pa //
NK085(ru)001:661: blo la nyams su lon pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:662: spyod yul yongs dag rnal 'byor ba'o //
NK085(ru)001:663: thun mong dam tshig mdor bsdus na //
NK085(ru)001:664: bdag gzhan don tu shes par bya //
NK085(ru)001:666: chang dang dregs spyod kheng sems dang //
NK085(ru)001:667: rdo rje gsum phog phyag byed dang //
NK085(ru)001:668: che dag dge smod sdig bstod dang //
NK085(ru)001:669: le lo ser sna gnyid g.yeng dang //
NK085(ru)001:670: khro gtum shes bzhin sngon mi btang //
NK085(ru)001:671: bka' gcag sdig pa'i grogs bsten dang //
NK085(ru)001:672: bag med spyod dang dam bca' 'dor //
NK085(ru)001:673: chog mi shes dang ngom la dga' //spang bya nyi shu gcig bzlog pa //
NK085(ru)001:674: bdag don mchog tu gyur pa ste //
NK085(ru)001:675: kun gyis bdag nyid khur bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:676: pha rol phyin drug chos spyod bcu //
NK085(ru)001:677: rnam bzhi las kyi spyod pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:678: mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa ni //
NK085(ru)001:679: theg pa dgu dang mu stegs dgu //
NK085(ru)001:680: 'gro ba drug gi spyod pa rnams //
NK085(ru)001:681: 'dzin dang nyam pa med par spyod //
NK085(ru)001:682: don 'gyur ci yang nyams su blang //
NK085(ru)001:683: bzhi bcu bzhi la sogs pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:684: gdul bya ma lus dor mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:685: bsrung bya de dag grangs brtab la //
NK085(ru)001:686: dran dang shes bzhin gyis sdod pa //
NK085(ru)001:687: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gsungs //
NK085(ru)001:688: nyams par gyur pa'i rgyu dag ni //
NK085(ru)001:689: mi chos blun po'i las byed dang //
NK085(ru)001:690: bdag bstod gzhan smod zur 'dzin mkhas //
NK085(ru)001:691: khe drags nyid kyis 'du ste brnab //
NK085(ru)001:692: rdzas la chags sems rang phyogs che //
NK085(ru)001:693: chang dang rang mthong lta spyod snyems //
NK085(ru)001:694: chos la phyogs ris ngoms rkyen dang //
NK085(ru)001:695: gsang chung le lo gtsang dme byed //
NK085(ru)001:696: sgro bskur grogs kyi nyams len dang //
NK085(ru)001:698: gcig pur mi gnas 'du la dga' //nyi shu nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)001:699: snga rtags sngon du 'byung ba ni //
NK085(ru)001:700: nyam nga ba yi nad rnams rung //
NK085(ru)001:701: dgrar bgeg gnyis la bden mi 'jug /
NK085(ru)001:703: ya kha ma nyes kha yogs 'byung //
NK085(ru)001:704: brtsams pa'i las la 'bras med cing //
NK085(ru)001:706: gal te nyams la rtags med par //
NK085(ru)001:707: legs par snang na mi rung ste //
NK085(ru)001:708: bde ba zad byas gtan du sdug /gal te ma nyams rtags byung na //
NK085(ru)001:709: sngon gyi rnam smin zad 'gyur phyir //
NK085(ru)001:710: skong gso'i las la brtson byas na //
NK085(ru)001:711: ngan song sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:712: nyams par gyur pa'i skyon rnams ni //
NK085(ru)001:713: byang sems dam tshig spangs par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:714: skal bar dge ba ci bsags kyang //
NK085(ru)001:715: gzhi rten med par 'gyur ba yin //
NK085(ru)001:717: sku yi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:718: ya nga'i nad sogs sdug bsngal tshe //
NK085(ru)001:719: dus min tsho zad bar chad mang //
NK085(ru)001:720: skal bar rdo rje dmyal bar ltung //
NK085(ru)001:721: bde bas rab tu brel bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:722: gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:723: bgegs rnams thogs med 'ong ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:724: rkyen dang ye 'drog mang ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:725: chos la byin rlabs med 'gyur zhing //
NK085(ru)001:726: skal pa gnyis su dmyal bar ltung //
NK085(ru)001:728: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:729: smyo 'bog dbang po nyams dag bcal //
NK085(ru)001:730: myos shing lkugs pa'i gnas su 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:731: gang yang bsgrub pa rtags med cing //
NK085(ru)001:732: lce la zhing rmod la sogs pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:733: dmyal bar skal pa gsum du gnas //
NK085(ru)001:734: rtsa ba kun nyams phyal ba dag /gso ba nye bar mi brtson na //
NK085(ru)001:735: rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste //
NK085(ru)001:736: dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi //
NK085(ru)001:737: sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pas ni //
NK085(ru)001:738: de yis 'bum gyi char mi phod //
NK085(ru)001:739: sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang //
NK085(ru)001:740: byang chub sems dpa'i 'phrin las kun //
NK085(ru)001:741: rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:742: bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su //
NK085(ru)001:743: de ni thon par mi 'gyur te //
NK085(ru)001:745: se gol gcig gis phyin par byed //
NK085(ru)001:746: de bas shin tu nan tan gyis //
NK085(ru)001:747: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:748: longs spyod mang du 'phel med dang //
NK085(ru)001:750: thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams //
NK085(ru)001:751: shin tu ring bar gyur ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:752: gdul bya'i don rnams yal bar 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:753: lta spyod ya char gyur pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:754: theg pa phyi nang 'dres pa nyid //
NK085(ru)001:755: bka' yi byin nyams grub par dka' //bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:756: zab mo'i chos las ring 'gyur zhing //
NK085(ru)001:757: skal par ngan song sdug bsngal myong //
NK085(ru)001:758: rnal 'byor sngo skams nyid du gyur //
NK085(ru)001:759: rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po des //
NK085(ru)001:760: dam tshig ma nyams gzhung thub na //
NK085(ru)001:761: lus la nad nyung mtshan ldan zhing //
NK085(ru)001:763: thun mong nyes byas dag gyur dang //
NK085(ru)001:764: srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur zhing //
NK085(ru)001:765: theg chen zab mo don thob 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:766: gsung gis lha mnyes don thob 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:767: mthu dang byin rlabs bsam mi khyab //
NK085(ru)001:769: bsam pa thams cad yongs su 'grub //
NK085(ru)001:770: thugs kyis skyo dub med pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:771: man ngag snod gyur dngos grub nye //
NK085(ru)001:772: dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:773: lha rnams kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:774: yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na //
NK085(ru)001:775: rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po yis //
NK085(ru)001:776: skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan te //
NK085(ru)001:777: bdud bzhi 'joms shing ngan song sbyong //
NK085(ru)001:778: theg chen lta spyod gzhung srang bas //
NK085(ru)001:780: don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:781: theg chen dam tshig la gnas shing //
NK085(ru)001:783: bsrungs pa med par thub pas na //
NK085(ru)001:784: dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK085(ru)001:785: de ni rnal 'byor chen po yin //
NK085(ru)001:786: nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni //
NK085(ru)001:787: byang chub sems kyi dam nyams pa //
NK085(ru)001:788: mkhas la blangs te gnas par bya'o //
NK085(ru)001:789: sku yi dam tshig nyams 'gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:790: gang la nyams pa der song la //
NK085(ru)001:791: nor zas 'byor pa mnyes phul nas //
NK085(ru)001:792: gang nyes tshig tu bshags byas la //
NK085(ru)001:793: phyin chad sdom pa legs par bca' //gal te grongs chad gyur pas na //
NK085(ru)001:794: de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la //
NK085(ru)001:795: de tsho gong ma bzhin du bshags //
NK085(ru)001:796: med na mnyam pa brgya la bshags //
NK085(ru)001:797: de yang rnyed par ma gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:798: de dang mnyam pa gsum bgug la //
NK085(ru)001:799: sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsigs la //
NK085(ru)001:800: dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rdzas su //
NK085(ru)001:801: spyan drang gsang mtshan la sogs mchod //
NK085(ru)001:802: gong du smos pa'i yon rnams ni //
NK085(ru)001:803: dpang po gsum la dbul bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)001:804: gal te gus pas mi len na //
NK085(ru)001:805: gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar ltung //
NK085(ru)001:806: de bas myur du tshangs par bya //
NK085(ru)001:807: gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:808: sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du //
NK085(ru)001:809: nges par shes na skongs par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:810: bzlas pa bldab kyis bsab pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:811: bsgrub pa chen po gsum gyis bskong //
NK085(ru)001:812: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:813: 'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na //
NK085(ru)001:814: bdag nyid bdag la gsang ba med //
NK085(ru)001:815: mi rtog ting 'dzin klong zhugs te //
NK085(ru)001:816: ma yengs blo la 'dris par bya //
NK085(ru)001:817: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:818: gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la //
NK085(ru)001:819: brgya rtsa brgyad kyis tshogs kyis bskang //
NK085(ru)001:820: de ltar nyams su blangs na 'grub //
NK085(ru)001:822: dam tshig chen po'i dpe bstan pa //
NK085(ru)001:823: sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:824: las dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun //
NK085(ru)001:825: dam tshig med par 'byung ba min //
NK085(ru)001:826: so mtshams dag gi rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:827: bsrung ba thub dang ma thub las //
NK085(ru)001:829: rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:831: nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:833: rno rbal mtshon gyi rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:834: 'khor ba'i d+r+wa ba ma lus gcod //
NK085(ru)001:835: pha ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:836: dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus bskyed //
NK085(ru)001:837: rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:838: brlabs chen dus su 'byung bar byed //
NK085(ru)001:839: me dpung lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:840: gang mchongs thams cad tshig par byed //
NK085(ru)001:841: de bzhin rtsi sman rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:843: rgyal po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:845: rgya mtshor nor len tshong dpon bzhin //
NK085(ru)001:846: thog ma nas mthar 'di phyin pas //
NK085(ru)001:847: 'di la shin tu nan tan byos //
NK085(ru)001:848: dam tshig dam tshig zhes bya ba //
NK085(ru)001:849: gud na yod pa ma yin te //
NK085(ru)001:850: rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin //
NK085(ru)001:851: ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams su //
NK085(ru)001:852: rang rig rkyen 'bras nyid snang bas //
NK085(ru)001:853: cir snang cir srid rang rig nyid //
NK085(ru)001:855: snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid //
NK085(ru)001:856: rang bzhin dam tshig chen por bshad //
NK085(ru)001:857: rang bzhin lhun grub dam tshig la //
NK085(ru)001:858: rig pas phyin ci ma log na //
NK085(ru)001:859: sngon snang brtag pa'i chos med pas //
NK085(ru)001:860: lta ba'i dam tshig chen por bshad //
NK085(ru)001:861: de don blo la 'dris pa yis //
NK085(ru)001:862: spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par //
NK085(ru)001:863: ting 'dzin rgyan gyi dam tshig ste //
NK085(ru)001:864: sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul cig /
NK085(ru)001:865: 'di la bsrung ba ci yang med //
NK085(ru)001:866: nyams pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid //
NK085(ru)001:867: nam mkha'i spyod pa 'dzin med pas //
NK085(ru)001:868: ltag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhir ldan //
NK085(ru)001:870: dam tshig kun gyi mdo zhes bya //
NK085(ru)001:871: sgyu 'phrul rnam bkod gtor tshogs rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen las //
NK085(ru)001:872: lam 'bras snying po me long bcu gcig gis mtshon pa //
NK085(ru)001:873: 'khor lo ngang mchu'i tshul gyis sgegs pa'i blos bsdus pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:874: dge rtsas kun kyang dam gnas 'gro kun byang chub myur thob shog //
NK085(ru)001:875: dam tshig gsal bkra zhes bya ba //
NK085(ru)001:876: slob dpon chen po sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa'o //
NK085(ru)001:878: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK085(ru)001:879: rang gi lha la phyag btsal nas //
NK085(ru)001:880: lam bzhi dag yod bya ba'i phyir //
NK085(ru)001:881: las snod skal bas gnas gyur pa //
NK085(ru)001:882: dam tshig phra rgyas gsungs pa de //
NK085(ru)001:883: thun mong mchog gi srung bya rnams //
NK085(ru)001:884: rnal 'byor cha la gnas pa yi //
NK085(ru)001:885: bdag dang gzhan dang chos kyi phyir //
NK085(ru)001:886: gzhung tshul srung ba 'di mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:887: snga ma srung bar bya ba ni //
NK085(ru)001:888: mtha' yas gsungs pa mdo tsam du //
NK085(ru)001:889: nges 'byung bzhi yis bzhi rnams dang //
NK085(ru)001:890: dka' thub 'dzin med sems kyis bsrung //
NK085(ru)001:891: gzhi phyir gzhan yang lus ngag gi //
NK085(ru)001:892: rgyan po 'gyed rnams dor ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:893: mtshon thogs 'phong rtsed mchong rgyug dang //
NK085(ru)001:894: ma rabs thor bu'i spyod kun dor //
NK085(ru)001:895: ngag gi bzhi dang grol ngag rnams //
NK085(ru)001:896: nam yang smra bar bya ba min //
NK085(ru)001:897: nyon mongs drug dang bying rgod sogs //
NK085(ru)001:898: skyon sems bye brag bsam mi khyab //
NK085(ru)001:899: gang dag don med de len pa //
NK085(ru)001:900: kha na ma tho 'phel ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:901: skye bo'i gnas su mi 'gyur pas //
NK085(ru)001:902: 'khor ba'i mtha' mar spyang thag yin //
NK085(ru)001:903: byang chub ched phyir gang yang spyad //
NK085(ru)001:904: de dag las ldog spyod pa gsum //
NK085(ru)001:905: sems kyis zin par gang spyod pa //
NK085(ru)001:906: sangs rgyas sku gsung thob par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:907: phyi ma rtsa la yan lag pas //
NK085(ru)001:908: lnga bcu'i brgya dang drug cu dang //
NK085(ru)001:909: nyis brgya'i srung bya ma lus pa //
NK085(ru)001:910: bka' lung gnyis kyi rjes su snyegs //
NK085(ru)001:911: pan tsi nying lag zhes bya ba'ang //
NK085(ru)001:912: dang po nyid nas thabs spyod dang //
NK085(ru)001:913: shes rab nyid kyis nyis 'gyur yin //
NK085(ru)001:914: de des srung bya sum bcu ste //
NK085(ru)001:915: byang chub sems ni bla med lha //
NK085(ru)001:916: zhi khro'i lha dgu nyid dang bcu //
NK085(ru)001:917: bcu gnyis bsam las mi 'da' zhing //
NK085(ru)001:918: thun mong mchog gis tshad med brgyad //
NK085(ru)001:919: bden gnyid byang chub rnam pa bcu //
NK085(ru)001:920: bla med gsal bas nyams mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:921: lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:922: bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na //
NK085(ru)001:924: de phyir dus gsum 'da' mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:925: bla ma bkur ba'ang sgo gsum gyis //
NK085(ru)001:926: lus kyi srung ba'ang brdeg sogs las //
NK085(ru)001:927: thing slad tsam du'ang bya ba min //
NK085(ru)001:928: 'dod yon lnga yi mchod pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:929: gsang ba'i snod du dug mi spyod //
NK085(ru)001:930: 'gro ba drang po'i phyogs spang dang //
NK085(ru)001:931: gdan sa gdan sogs mi barlama dang //
NK085(ru)001:933: rgyan 'dogs ze ldir de bzhin te //
NK085(ru)001:934: ma rabs spyod pa kun spangs la //
NK085(ru)001:935: spyod lam zon chag bsti mi gnas bya //
NK085(ru)001:936: rdzun dang phra ma ngag rtsub dang //
NK085(ru)001:937: 'khyal ba nam yang mi bya ste //
NK085(ru)001:938: be phogs ma yin rta bgad dor //
NK085(ru)001:939: lkog tu tshul brjod nyams par 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:940: yon tan brjod cing snyan par smra //
NK085(ru)001:941: ca co la sogs ma yin pas //
NK085(ru)001:942: sangs rgyas rdo rje gsung thob 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:943: dam pa ston pa'i bla ma la //
NK085(ru)001:944: chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //
NK085(ru)001:945: phrag dog dug lnga'i sems mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:946: ngan du mi sems lci bar sems //
NK085(ru)001:947: pha ma yi dam 'dra bar bsam //
NK085(ru)001:948: rtag tu gdung ba rgyun mi bcad //
NK085(ru)001:949: byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin //
NK085(ru)001:950: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK085(ru)001:951: zhi khro'i phyag rgya bdun gnyis dang //
NK085(ru)001:952: phyogs bcing rten dang khang pa'i sngags //
NK085(ru)001:953: rtsa skyed las rnams bzhi yi sngags //
NK085(ru)001:954: dbang bskur byin bsdu gsang sngags dang //
NK085(ru)001:955: spyan drangs stim brtan phyag 'tshal mchod //
NK085(ru)001:956: dus gsum rgyun du gzhi yin phyir //
NK085(ru)001:957: nam yang rgyun bcad spang mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:958: yang dag lam du zhugs pa'i grogs //
NK085(ru)001:959: bsnun dang ma byin blang mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:960: zla zer ma yin gzungs mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:961: lta spyod mtho ba'i gong mi bcad //
NK085(ru)001:962: dbang dang dam tshig de bzhin ste //
NK085(ru)001:963: kun tu yangs bag zon phrig can //
NK085(ru)001:964: bkur stis mchod byed dga' bar spyod //
NK085(ru)001:965: rdzun sogs rnam bzhi spang ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:966: gsang bya mi smra tshul mi brjod //
NK085(ru)001:967: snyan smra zhe sa gsong por smra //
NK085(ru)001:968: bden tshig sri zhu smra byed pa'o //
NK085(ru)001:969: sems kyi sngon bzhin dug lnga dor //
NK085(ru)001:970: mngan dang dpyad sems spang ba dang //
NK085(ru)001:971: mig 'drar lta zhing gdung bar bya //
NK085(ru)001:972: gnod sems spang dang rnam bcu'o //
NK085(ru)001:973: gsang ba'i don phyir mi smra ba //
NK085(ru)001:974: spyi dang bar gsang bzhi bzhi dang //
NK085(ru)001:975: 'os dang gnyen gtad rnam pa bcu //
NK085(ru)001:976: sems kyis bstan par mi bsam zhing //
NK085(ru)001:977: ngag gis brjod par yongs mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:978: lus brdas bstan min sum cu'o //
NK085(ru)001:979: yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la //
NK085(ru)001:980: gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye //
NK085(ru)001:981: dang du blang ba'i dam bsgrub rdzas //
NK085(ru)001:982: bsgrub rdzas lnga yang rtsa ba brgyad //
NK085(ru)001:983: brgyad cha re zhing dang snyigs lnga //
NK085(ru)001:984: re re'ang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:985: zhing bcu'i bdud rtsi'i de bzhin pas //
NK085(ru)001:986: rnam par dbye ba nyi shu'o //
NK085(ru)001:987: bdag gzhan rang bzhin zhing dang gnyis //
NK085(ru)001:988: rdzas bcu thabs spyod shes rab spyod //
NK085(ru)001:989: bcu gnyis nyi shur 'gyur ba'ang rigs //
NK085(ru)001:990: mi spang lnga la bcu gnyis te //
NK085(ru)001:991: zhing bcu thabs kyi mdzad pas 'joms //
NK085(ru)001:992: shes rab rang bzhin med par grol //
NK085(ru)001:993: thabs dang shes rab zhe sdang gis //
NK085(ru)001:994: bdag gzhan don rnams rdzogs par byed //
NK085(ru)001:995: yan lag bcu yi dam tshig la //
NK085(ru)001:996: thabs kyi mdzad pa mi 'byed cing //
NK085(ru)001:997: shes rab gnyis med mi 'byed pa'i //
NK085(ru)001:998: gti mug bcu gnyis 'da' mi bya //
NK085(ru)001:999: de ltar thabs dang shes rab bcu //
NK085(ru)001:1000: gnyis ni gdeng du gyur pa yi //
NK085(ru)001:1001: lhag pa'i nga rgyal mi 'da' ba //
NK085(ru)001:1002: nga rgyal chen po'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)001:1003: zhing bcu thugs rjes mi gtong ba //
NK085(ru)001:1004: rigs lnga'i yum la thabs kyis rol //
NK085(ru)001:1005: ting 'dzin thabs dbang rang bzhin sbyar //
NK085(ru)001:1007: ma rtogs gnyis dang log rtogs gnyis //
NK085(ru)001:1008: nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems //
NK085(ru)001:1009: gsang sngags phyi pa'i theg pa gsum //
NK085(ru)001:1010: gsang sgor mdzad pas mi tshud cing //
NK085(ru)001:1011: shes rab lta ngan mi chud pa //
NK085(ru)001:1012: phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)001:1013: de ltar sum brgya drug cu rnams //
NK085(ru)001:1014: bdag gi rdo rje mchog gsum pos //
NK085(ru)001:1015: log par mi stong sdom pa'i dngos //
NK085(ru)001:1016: sa gzhi lta bur srung ba yin //
NK085(ru)001:1017: rgyas 'bring stong rtsa brgyad dang ni //
NK085(ru)001:1018: sa ya 'bum sde bdag gzhan phyir //
NK085(ru)001:1019: srung ba'i rgyud dag las grags pa //
NK085(ru)001:1020: gsum gyi srung pa sngon bzhin no //
NK085(ru)001:1021: dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che //
NK085(ru)001:1022: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /
NK085(ru)001:1024: dbang phyug chen po nyid du 'gyur //
NK085(ru)001:1025: byin rlabs gsum gyis mdzad pa dang //
NK085(ru)001:1026: nye 'du las byang rtag tu srung //
NK085(ru)001:1028: phun sum tshogs yon rgyud las 'byung //
NK085(ru)001:1029: myong la dam tshig rdo rje chu //
NK085(ru)001:1030: bzhag cing go bas bsgrags byas nas //
NK085(ru)001:1031: rgyud lnga tha tshigs bral 'gyur na //
NK085(ru)001:1032: rag sha yag shar gyur nas kyang //
NK085(ru)001:1033: bsad nas dmyal ba chen po brgyud //
NK085(ru)001:1034: de yi sdug bsngal bzod glags chad //
NK085(ru)001:1035: sa ma ya bi tan+t+ra las //
NK085(ru)001:1036: nyes gsum thos pa'ang nyam nga na //
NK085(ru)001:1037: 'di phyis mthong myong smos ci dgos //
NK085(ru)001:1038: de bas rgyun du mdo bshags bsngo //
NK085(ru)001:1039: gang dag sa gzhi med pa dag /tshul 'chos phyir na yon tan brjod //
NK085(ru)001:1040: nyes smra rdo rje'i dam ldan min //
NK085(ru)001:1041: lhag par bdag ldan smos phyir ro //
NK085(ru)001:1042: rnal 'byor lam mthar phyin bya zhing //
NK085(ru)001:1043: bdag gzhan don phyir phra rgyas bsdus //
NK085(ru)001:1044: ngal ba'i dge rtsa gang yod pas //
NK085(ru)001:1045: mtha' yas rdo rje gsum thob shog /dam tshig phra
NK085(ru)001:1046: rgyas bstan pa rdzogs so /////sgyu 'phrul dam tshig gsal
NK085(ru)001:1047: byed spar // bstan gnyis dar gling chos grwar bskrun //
NK085(ru)001:1049: skye kun dam tshig rnam dag shog /dge'o //
